data.oai_dc:dc: Alignment used in the Bayesian inference analysis to create the phylogenetic tree used in the comparative method. Sequences originally published in Baker R.H., G. S. Wilkinson, and R. DeSalle. 2001. Phylogenetic utility of different types of molecular data used to infer evolutionary relationships among stalk-eyed flies (Diopsidae). Systematic Biology 50: 87-105. All sequences are available in GenBank.
Allometry|Evolutionary constraints|Morphology|Sexual selection|Phylogenetic comparative method|Phylogenetic inertia
